}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "G-240W-E_MB Ver.C" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
"Nokia WiFi Gateway 3 (G-240W-E), GPON residential gateway ONT with 2 POTS :ports, 4 GE UNI, 5G Wi-Fi, and 3x3 2.4G Wi-Fi. Includes two USB 2.0 Type A ports and a 12V US 2-pin plug, wall-mounted power :supply variant with a barrel-type DC connector" - User Manual on the FCC. :There is a spot for a fourth 2.4 GHz FEM but it is not populated in this device.
The CPU ID is not legible in the FCC internal photos. A screenshot in the User Manual :of the Device Information page of the configuration interface shows the chipset as :BCM68460 but appears to be from the [[Nokia HA-030W-B]] ([https://fccid.io/2ADZRHA030WB 2ADZRHA030WB]) :which has a similar design but a different CPU.
===Models=== :;*[[Nokia]] • [[List of ONT Devices]] *[[Nokia G-240W-J]] • 2ADZRG240WJ (2019-10-25) • ISAM ONT + *[[Nokia G-240W-G]] • 2ADZRG240WG (2018-10-21) • ISAM ONT *[[Nokia G-240W-E]] • 2ADZRG240WE (2018-08-08) • GPON ONU *[[Nokia G-240W-C]] • 2ADZRG240W-C (2018-06-29) GPON ONU * *[[Nokia G-240W-F v2]] • 2ADZRG240WFV2 (2017-10-22) • GPON ONU *[[Nokia A-240Z-A]] • 2ADZRA240ZA (2017-09-30) • A-240Z-A * *[[Nokia G-240W-F]] • 2ADZRG240WF (2017-06-02) • G-240W-F *[[Nokia G-240WZ-A]] • 2ADZRG240WZA (2016-11-25) • Digital Home ONU *[[Nokia G-240W-A]] • 2ADZRG240WA (2016-07-19) • GPON ONT *[[Nokia G-240W-B]] • 2ADZRG240WB (2015-10-03) • GPON ONU * *[[Nokia G-241W-A]] • 2ADZRG241W-A (2015-07-24) • GPON ONU *[[Nokia I-240W-A]] • 2ADZRI240WA (2015-07-14) • GPON ONU *[[Nokia G-240G-E]] • [https://openwrt.org/inbox/toh/bt/g-240g-e_1 On '''OpenWrt''' wiki] • [[Nokia]] :CPU: [[EcoNet]] EN7526GT (EN751221) MIPS 34Kc V5.8 :CPU/Speed: 2x Thread 1x Core @900MHz :RAM: [[Nanya]] NT5CC128M16JR-EK 256MB (DDR3L 1866MHz) :Flash: [[Macronix]] MX35LF1GE4AB-Z4I 128MB (SPI NAND) :Ethernet: 4x GbE LAN (10/100/1000Mbit/s) :Fiber: 1x GPON SC-APC • Semtech GN25L98 :Phone: 2x RJ11 SIP & VoIP • [[MaxLinear]]/ :[[Intel (Lantiq)]] PEF32002 (SLLV5) SLIC
